import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./topbar.css"; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Header from '../Images/header.svg'; export default function Topbar() { const user = true; let lightPurpleColor = "#C29EFC" let darkPurpleColor = "#5400C0" const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ body:{ flex:"display", flexDirection:"column", color:"black", width:"100%", }, profilePic:{ borderRadius:"50%", width:'150px', height:"150px", position: "absolute", top: "25%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", }, topInfo:{ flex:"display", flexDirection:"row", background:"black", color:"white", height:"50px", } , bottomInfo:{ flex:"display", flexDirection:"row", position: "absolute", top: "90%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", borderColor:"black", borderStyle:"solid", width:"95%", } , middleInfo:{ flex:"display", justifyContent:"start", alignContent:"start" }, container:{ position: "relative", textAlign: "center", color: "white", }, centered:{ position: "absolute", top: "30%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", }, fontTitle:{ fontFamily: "PersonalityDEMO", fontSize:"9vw", position: "absolute", top: "10%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", color:"white", } , fontLink:{ fontFamily: "PersonalityDEMO", fontSize:"2em", color:"white", }, })) const classes = useStyles() return (
